mapper.insert: insert into com_application (id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id, captain, member_qq, member_phone, mailbox, teacher ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamBiaoshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamKouhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{captain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update com_application set team_name = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_capacity = #{teamCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_school = #{memberSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_biaoshi = #{teamBiaoshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, team_kouhao = #{teamKouhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_type = #{comType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, captain = #{captain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_qq = #{memberQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_phone = #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mailbox = #{mailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id, captain, member_qq, member_phone, mailbox, teacher from com_application where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id, captain, member_qq, member_phone, mailbox, teacher from com_application

select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id,captain, member_qq, member_phone,mailbox, teacher from com_application where com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id,captain, member_qq, member_phone,mailbox, teacher from com_application where member_id = #{memberId} and com_id =#{comId}

select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id,captain, member_qq, member_phone,mailbox, teacher from com_application where team_biaoshi = #{teamBiaoshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, team_name, team_capacity, member_id, member_name, member_school, team_biaoshi, team_kouhao, com_type, com_id,captain, member_qq, member_phone,mailbox, teacher from com_application where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
